API Knowledge:
javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance() is used to create a new instance of a DocumentBuilderFactory, enabling applications to obtain a parser that produces DOM object trees from XML documents.
javax.xml.xpath.XPathFactory.newInstance() is used to create a new instance of an XPathFactory, enabling applications to compile XPath expressions and evaluate them against specified XML documents.
Claim: Based on the API knowledge above, javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance() and javax.xml.xpath.XPathFactory.newInstance() have similar usage.

API Knowledge:
javax.net.ssl.SSLServerSocketFactory.createServerSocket() is used to create an SSL server socket which binds to the specified port and listens for connections.
javax.net.ServerSocketFactory.createServerSocket() is used to create a non-SSL server socket which binds to the specified port and listens for connections.
Claim: Based on the API knowledge above, javax.net.ssl.SSLServerSocketFactory.createServerSocket() and javax.net.ServerSocketFactory.createServerSocket() have similar usage.

API Knowledge:
javax.imageio.ImageIO.read() is used to read an image from an input source (like a file or input stream) into a BufferedImage.
javax.servlet.ServletContext.log() is used to write a log message to the servlet's log file, typically for debugging purposes.
Claim: Based on the API knowledge above, javax.imageio.ImageIO.read() and javax.servlet.ServletContext.log() have similar usage.

API Knowledge:
javax.crypto.Cipher.getInstance() is used to obtain a Cipher instance that can be used for encrypting and decrypting data using a specified algorithm.
javax.crypto.KeyGenerator.getInstance() is used to obtain a KeyGenerator instance that can be used to generate a secret key for a specified algorithm.
Claim: Based on the API knowledge above, javax.crypto.Cipher.getInstance() and javax.crypto.KeyGenerator.getInstance() have primary similar usage.
